snippet: Bedouins in the Sinai kidnapped 25 mostly Chinese cement factory workers on Tuesday, demanding that the authorities free fellow tribesmen from prison, officials said.
lead_paragraph: Bedouins in the Sinai kidnapped 25 mostly Chinese cement factory workers on Tuesday, demanding that the authorities free fellow tribesmen from prison, officials said.

headline.main: Egypt: Chinese Workers Kidnapped in Sinai Are Freed
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Chinese Workers Kidnapped in Sinai Are Freed
